title: Bound
description: Once finally back in her hometown of Washington, North Carolina, seventeen-year-old Emma Morgan learns the simple life she knew three years ago has changed from the moment she meets the charmingly, bright-eyed Liam Alexander. But when her brother, Sean voices his disapproval, Emma finds her loyalty in the way of her new found curiosity. Only the more she tries to avoid him the more she finds Liam in her constant company. A risk that will lead Emma into discovering a secret no human must ever know. One that might just cost her her life...
author: Jennifer  Dean
